constituent: emulate, person, set free, compass, direction, taskmaster
koohiiStory1: Mr T downloads an emulator so that he can play his favorite game, Pokemon. He plays for a different reason, though - he hates to see them poor little foos in the ball so he spends his entire time setting them free.
koohiiStory2: The black slave who was set free (#496) decides to emulate Mr. T, his role model. He uses his compass to head to Cali to start anew.
myStory: chữ Phỏng. mô phỏng, theo gương, bắt chước. nhân + phóng (phóng túng, buông thả, phương + phộc, nơi nào cũng đánh nhau). người phóng túng cần phải noi gương người khác
